sentences.english: Bamboo water side edge loose stone, a good ten years ago in the wind.

sentences.english: Another year and another dream had been eaten by the locusts .

sentences.english: Raw materials come in from one end of the assembly line and products come out from the other.
sentences.chinese: 原料从流水线一端进来，产品由另一端出去。

sentences.english: Feelings are like waters, the shallow murmurs, but the deep are dumb.

sentences.english: Modulo scheduling is a state-of-art scheme in the literature of software pipelining.

sentences.english: I'm afraid our football team was really plastered  last week.
